title: Remove Template Designer Option from UI

requirements.text: Remove the Template Designer UI entry point (button, menu item, tab, or dialog trigger) from the application so that users can no longer open the TemplateDesigner component. Do not delete or modify any template code, template data, or the TemplateDesigner component itself â€” only hide/remove the UI control that launches it.

quotes: I want to remove templete designer option i want only fixed templete which i will modify one by one just remove the option dont change any code or any templete first

acceptanceCriteria: No button, link, tab, or menu item that opens the Template Designer is visible in the UI.
The TemplateDesigner component file (TemplateDesigner.tsx) is not modified.
All existing fixed/built-in templates remain accessible and unchanged.
No template logic, template data, or backend code is altered.
The app builds and renders without errors after the change.

constraints: Do not modify TemplateDesigner.tsx or any template definition files.
Do not change any backend code.
Do not alter any existing template data or template logic.
nonGoals: Refactoring or cleaning up unused imports related to TemplateDesigner.
